Key Match Events: CJ McCollum scored 38 points to lead the New Orleans Pelicans past the Philadelphia 76ers 123-115.
Jordan Hawkins buried a 3 in the third for a 70-67 lead and Dejounte Murray sank one for a 76-67 lead.
McCollum buried a 3 in the fourth to push the lead back to 10 points and put the finishing touches on the win with a 12-foot step back jumper.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pelicans snapped a two-game losing streak and won for only the third time since Dec. 7.
The 76ers are just 8-15 when Joel Embiid doesn't play.
